atk-s0508a29:2_0: Terasanipāte yāhu raṭṭhetiādikā āyasmato soṇassa koḷivisassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a29:2_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacini. Ayaṁ kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a29:2_2: bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike
atk-s0508a29:2_3: dhammaṁ sutvā pasannamānaso satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṁ kāretvā nānāvaṇṇehi
atk-s0508a29:2_4: pupphehi santharitvā upari nānāvirāgavatthehi vitānaṁ bandhāpesi, tathā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0508a29:2_5: ca dīghasālaṁ kāretvā niyyādesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a29:2_6: bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti, sirivaḍḍhotissa nāmaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0508a29:2_7: So vayappatto vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ
atk-s0508a29:2_8: āraddhavīriyānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā, sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthento sattāhaṁ
atk-s0508a29:2_9: mahādānaṁ pavattetvā paṇidhānamakāsi. Satthāpi tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a29:3_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṁ kusalaṁ katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto parinibbute kassapadasabale
atk-s0508a29:3_1: anuppanne amhākaṁ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṁ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto gaṅgātīre
atk-s0508a29:3_2: paṇṇasālaṁ karitvā ekaṁ paccekabuddhaṁ temāsaṁ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṁ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0508a29:3_3: Paccekabuddho vuṭṭhavasso paripuṇṇaparikkhāro gandhamādanameva gato. Sopi kulaputto
atk-s0508a29:3_4: yāvajīvaṁ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato
atk-s0508a29:3_5: kāle campānagare usabhaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi. Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0508a29:3_6: paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi. Tassa jātadivase sakalanagare mahāsakkārasampanno
atk-s0508a29:3_8: sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi, tenassa soṇoti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Mahatā parivārena
atk-s0508a29:3_9: vaḍḍhati , tassa hatthapādatalāni bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇāni ahesuṁ, satavihatakappāsassa
atk-s0508a29:3_10: viya samphasso pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇāni lomāni jāyiṁsu. Vayappattassa tassa
atk-s0508a29:3_11: tiṇṇaṁ utūnaṁ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni upaṭṭhāpesuṁ. So tattha mahatiṁ
atk-s0508a29:4_0: Atha amhākaṁ satthari sabbaññutaṁ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṁ upanissāya
atk-s0508a29:4_1: viharante bimbisāraraññā pakkosāpito asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṁ rājagahaṁ āgato,
atk-s0508a29:4_2: satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā sāsane
atk-s0508a29:4_3: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā, janasaṁsaggapariharaṇatthaṁ
atk-s0508a29:4_4: sītavane vasanto ‘‘mama sarīraṁ sukhumālaṁ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṁ adhigantuṁ,
atk-s0508a29:4_5: kāyaṁ kilametvā samaṇadhammaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya, padhānamanuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a29:4_6: pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhahitesupi vedanaṁ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṁ vīriyaṁ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya
atk-s0508a29:4_7: visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ asakkonto, ‘‘evaṁ vāyamantopi ahaṁ maggaṁ vā phalaṁ vā nibbattetuṁ
atk-s0508a29:4_8: na sakkomi, kiṁ me pabbajjāya, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjissāmi, puññāni ca karissāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a29:4_9: cintesi. Satthā tassa cittācāraṁ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṁ
atk-s0508a29:4_10: dassento kammaṭṭhānaṁ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṁ gato. Soṇattheropi satthu sammukhā ovādaṁ
atk-s0508a29:4_11: labhitvā vīriyasamataṁ yojetvā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena
atk-s0508a29:6: Sudhāya lepanaṁ katvā, caṅkamaṁ kārayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:15: ‘‘Yo so haṭṭhena cittena, dīghasālaṁ adāsi me;
atk-s0508a29:32: Okkāko nāma nāmena, rājā raṭṭhe bhavissati.
atk-s0508a29:36: Taruṇī ca piyā kaññā, mahesittaṁ karissati.
atk-s0508a29:38: Varaṁ laddhāna sā kaññā, putte pabbājayissati.
atk-s0508a29:42: Mā no jāti pabhijjīti, nikhaṇissanti khattiyā.
atk-s0508a29:56: Ṭhatvāna yogassa payuttatādino, tatottariṁ pāramatā na vijjati.
atk-s0508a29:58: Bhāro me ohito sabbo, nibbutomhi anāsavo.
atk-s0508a29:62: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena aññābyākaraṇavasena ca –
atk-s0508a29:65: Svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho, soṇo dukkhassa pāragū.
atk-s0508a29:67: ‘‘Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0508a29:71: Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṁ na gacchati.
atk-s0508a29:77: Akiccaṁ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0508a29:84: Vīṇopamaṁ karitvā me, dhammaṁ deseti cakkhumā;
atk-s0508a29:85: Tassāhaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, vihāsiṁ sāsane rato.
atk-s0508a29:88: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:97: Katassa paticayo natthi, karaṇīyaṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a29:100: Evaṁ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā.
atk-s0508a29:103: Ṭhitaṁ cittaṁ visaññuttaṁ, vayañcassānupassatī’’ti. – imā gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a29:104_0: Tattha yāhu raṭṭhe samukkaṭṭhoti yo ahu ahosi aṅgaraṭṭhe asītiyā gāmikasahassehi
atk-s0508a29:104_1: bhogasampattiyā issariyasampattiyā ca sammā ativiya ukkaṭṭho seṭṭho. Rañño aṅgassa
atk-s0508a29:104_2: paddhagūti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisāya rañjanaṭṭhena rañño aṅgādhipatino bimbisārassa
atk-s0508a29:104_3: parivārabhūto gahapativiseso tassa raṭṭhe kuṭumbiko ahūti yojetabbaṁ. Svājja dhammesu
atk-s0508a29:104_4: ukkaṭṭhoti so soṇo ajjetarahi lokuttaradhammesu ukkaṭṭho jāto, gihikālepi kehici
atk-s0508a29:104_5: ukkaṭṭhoyeva hutvā idāni pabbajitakālepi ukkaṭṭhoyeva hotīti attānameva paraṁ viya
atk-s0508a29:104_6: dasseti. Dukkhassa pāragūti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṁ pariyantaṁ gato, etena
atk-s0508a29:104_7: dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti avisesena vuttaṁ ukkaṭṭhabhāvaṁ viseseti arahattādhigamadīpanato.
atk-s0508a29:105_0: Idāni yāya paṭipattiyā dukkhapāragū jāto, aññāpadesena taṁ dassento ‘‘pañca chinde’’ti
atk-s0508a29:105_1: gāthamāha. Tassattho – apāyakāmasugatisampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni puriso
atk-s0508a29:105_2: satthena pāde baddharajjukaṁ viya heṭṭhimena maggattayena chindeyya, rūpārūpabhavasampāpakāni
atk-s0508a29:105_3: pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṁ viya aggamaggena jaheyya,
atk-s0508a29:105_4: chindeyya, tesaṁ pana uddhambhāgiyasaṁyojanānaṁ pahānāya pañca saddhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0508a29:105_5: uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya. Evaṁbhūto pana bhikkhu rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti
atk-s0508a29:105_6: pañcannaṁ saṅgānaṁ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā, kāmogho, bhavogho, diṭṭhogho,
atk-s0508a29:105_7: avijjoghoti catunnaṁ oghānaṁ tiṇṇattā oghatiṇṇoti vuccati.
atk-s0508a29:106_0: Ayañca oghataraṇapaṭipattisīlādīnaṁ pāripūriyāva hoti, sīlādayo ca mānādippahānena
atk-s0508a29:106_1: pāripūriṁ gacchanti, na aññathāti dassento ‘‘unnaḷassā’’ti gāthamāha. Tattha unnaḷassāti
atk-s0508a29:106_2: uggatatucchamānassa. Māno hi unnamanākāravuttiyā tucchabhāvena naḷo viyāti ‘‘naḷo’’ti
atk-s0508a29:106_3: vuccati. Pamattassāti sativossaggena pamādaṁ āpannassa. Bāhirāsassāti bāhiresu āyatanesu
atk-s0508a29:106_4: āsāvato, kāmesu avītarāgassāti attho. Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṁ na gacchatīti
atk-s0508a29:106_5: tassa sīlādīnaṁ paṭipakkhasevino lokiyopi tāva sīlādiguṇo pāripūriṁ na gacchati, pageva lokuttaro.
atk-s0508a29:107_0: Tattha kāraṇamāha ‘‘yañhi kicca’’ntiādinā. Bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a29:107_2: kiccaṁ nāma. Yehi pana idaṁ yathāvuttaṁ attano kiccaṁ, taṁ apaviddhaṁ akaraṇena chaḍḍitaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:107_4: evamādi parikkhāramaṇḍanaṁ paccayabāhuliyanti evamādi bhikkhuno akiccaṁ nāma, taṁ
atk-s0508a29:107_5: kayirati, tesaṁ mānanaḷaṁ ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṁ sativossaggena pamattānaṁ
atk-s0508a29:108_0: Yesaṁ pana paññādiguṇo vaḍḍhati, te dassetuṁ ‘‘yesa’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha susamāraddhāti
atk-s0508a29:108_1: suṭṭhu paggahitā. Kāyagatā satīti, kāyānupassanābhāvanā. Akiccaṁ teti te etaṁ pattamaṇḍanādiakiccaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:108_2: Na sevantīti na karonti. Kicceti, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kattabbe aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanādike.
atk-s0508a29:108_3: Sātaccakārinoti satatakārino tesaṁ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṁ sātthakasampajaññaṁ,
atk-s0508a29:108_5: sampajānānaṁ, cattāropi āsavā atthaṁ gacchanti parikkhayaṁ abhāvaṁ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0508a29:109_0: Idāni attano santike ṭhitabhikkhūnaṁ ovādaṁ dento ‘‘ujumaggamhī’’ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a29:109_1: ujumaggamhi akkhāteti antadvayaparivajjanena kāyavaṅkādippahānena ca ujuke majjhimapaṭipadābhūte
atk-s0508a29:109_2: ariyamagge satthārā bhāsite. Gacchathāti paṭipajjatha. Mā nivattathāti antarā vosānaṁ
atk-s0508a29:109_3: māpajjatha. Attanā codayattānanti idha atthakāmo kulaputto apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādinā
atk-s0508a29:109_4: attanāva attānaṁ codento. Nibbānamabhihārayeti, attānaṁ nibbānaṁ abhihareyya upaneyya,
atk-s0508a29:109_5: yathā naṁ sacchikaroti, tathā paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a29:110_0: Idāni mayāpi evameva paṭipannanti, attano paṭipattiṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘accāraddhamhī’’tiādi
atk-s0508a29:110_1: vuttaṁ. Accāraddhamhi vīriyamhīti vipassanaṁ bhāventena mayā samādhinā vīriyaṁ samarasaṁ
atk-s0508a29:110_2: akatvā ativiya vīriye paggahite. Accāraddhavīriyatā cassa heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Vīṇopamaṁ
atk-s0508a29:110_3: karitvā meti āyasmato soṇassa ‘‘ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti.
atk-s0508a29:110_4: Ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro, atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati, tasmāhaṁ
atk-s0508a29:110_5: vibbhamissāmī’’ti citte uppanne satthā iddhiyā tassa sammukhe attānaṁ dassetvā ‘‘kasmā
atk-s0508a29:110_6: tvaṁ, soṇa, ‘vibbhamissāmī’ti cittaṁ uppādesi, kusalo tvaṁ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya
atk-s0508a29:110_7: tantissare’’ti pucchitvā tena ‘‘evaṁ, bhante’’ti vutte ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññasi, soṇa? Yadā
atk-s0508a29:110_8: te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā
atk-s0508a29:110_9: vāti? No hetaṁ, bhante! Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā
atk-s0508a29:110_10: honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? No hetaṁ, bhante.
atk-s0508a29:110_11: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, soṇa, yadā pana te vīṇāya tantiyo neva accāyatā honti, nātisithilā
atk-s0508a29:110_12: same guṇe patiṭṭhitā, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti?
atk-s0508a29:110_13: Evaṁ, bhante. Evameva kho, soṇa, accāraddhavīriyaṁ uddhaccāya saṁvattati, atilīnavīriyaṁ
atk-s0508a29:110_14: kosajjāya saṁvattati, tasmātiha tvaṁ, soṇa, vīriyasamataṁ adhiṭṭhaha, indriyānañca
atk-s0508a29:110_15: samataṁ paṭivijjhā’’ti evaṁ vīṇaṁ upamaṁ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a29:110_16: dhammaṁ desesi. Tassāhaṁ vacanaṁ sutvāti tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ vīṇopamovādaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a29:110_17: antarā uppannaṁ vibbhamitukāmataṁ pahāya satthu sāsane rato abhirato vihariṁ.
atk-s0508a29:111_0: Viharanto ca samathaṁ paṭipādesiṁ vīriyasamataṁ yojento saddhāpaññānaṁ viya samādhivīriyānaṁ
atk-s0508a29:111_1: samarasataṁ uppādento jhānādhiṭṭhānaṁ vipassanāsamādhiṁ sampādesiṁ vipassanaṁ ussukkāpesiṁ.
atk-s0508a29:111_2: Tattha payojanaṁ āha ‘‘uttamatthassa pattiyā’’ti. Uttamatthassa pattiyāti arahattādhigamāyāti attho.
atk-s0508a29:112_0: Idāni yathā paṭipannassa samathavipassanā sampajjiṁsu, taṁ aññāpadesena dassento
atk-s0508a29:112_2: tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena yuttappayuttassa, paṭhamaṁ tāva pabbajjābhimukho
atk-s0508a29:112_3: hutvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ca sīlavisodhanaṁ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṁ bhāvanābhiyogoti
atk-s0508a29:112_4: evamādīsu anavajjadhammesu yuttappayuttassāti attho. Pavivekañca cetasoti cetaso
atk-s0508a29:112_5: pavivekañca adhimuttassa evaṁ nekkhammādhimuttassa sato catukkapañcakajjhānānaṁ nibbattanena
atk-s0508a29:112_6: viveke yuttassa payuttassa. Abyābajjhādhimuttassāti abyābajjhe nidukkhatāya adhimuttassa
atk-s0508a29:112_7: jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samathasukhe yuttappayuttassa. Upādānakkhayassa cāti
atk-s0508a29:112_8: catunnampi upādānānaṁ khayante arahatte adhimuttassa. Bhummatthe hi etaṁ sāmivacanaṁ.
atk-s0508a29:112_9: Taṁ yathādhigataṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā arahattādhigamāya vipassanaṁ anuyuñjantassāti attho.
atk-s0508a29:113_0: Taṇhakkhayādhimuttassāti taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo, nibbānaṁ, tasmiṁ adhimuttassa
atk-s0508a29:113_1: upādiṁ bhayato, anupādiñca khemato dassanena nirodhe ninnapoṇapabbhārassa. Asammohañca
atk-s0508a29:113_3: vā cittassa asammohabhūtaṁ ariyamaggaṁ adhimuttassa. Disvā āyatanuppādanti cakkhādīnaṁ
atk-s0508a29:113_4: āyatanānaṁ yathāsakapaccayehi khaṇe khaṇe uppādaṁ, tappaṭipakkhato nirodhañca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya
atk-s0508a29:113_5: maggapaññāya disvā dassanahetu sammā cittaṁ vimuccatīti sammā hetunā ñāyena maggapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0508a29:114_0: ‘‘Tassa sammā vimuttassā’’tiādīsu ayaṁ saṅkhepattho – tassa vuttanayena sammadeva
atk-s0508a29:114_1: sabbasaṁkilesato vimuttassa, tato eva accantupasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno
atk-s0508a29:114_2: katassa kusalassa akusalassa vā upacayo natthi maggeneva samugghātitattā, pariññādibhedaṁ
atk-s0508a29:114_3: karaṇīyaṁ na vijjati katakiccattā. Evaṁ bhūtassa yathā ekaghano selo pabbato pakativātena
atk-s0508a29:114_4: na samīrati na saṁkampati, evaṁ iṭṭhā ca aniṭṭhā ca rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā tādino
atk-s0508a29:114_5: tādibhāvappattassa ṭhitaṁ anejaṁ pahīnasabbasokatāya visaṁyuttaṁ cittaṁ nappavedhanti
atk-s0508a29:114_6: na cālenti. Assa ca ārammaṇadhammassa kālena kālaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā vipassanto
atk-s0508a29:114_7: vayaṁ nirodhaṁ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṁ anupassatīti aññaṁ byākāsi.
